title: Mission did not apply
body: So i play 1 ranked game to complete "The journey begins" mission and when i finish,it's still marked as incomplete,although i met all the requirements.What's up.

replies.body:
I've been seeing a lot of problems where missions are being updated really slowly, but almost all of them are getting updated with a little time. It looks like this match was played not too long ago, so try refreshing your client really quickly if you haven't yet and let me know if it updates. I'm going to reach out and see if there's any way to update this mission on our end, but I'm not 100% sure if it would work correctly from my end (since there are two branching paths, I wouldn't want you to end up on the wrong side y'know?)

In the meantime, refresh your client like I mentioned and if it doesn't update immediately go ahead and try playing another ranked solo/duo to see if it updates now.
Ok,second ranked game did the trick,thanks.

I have already refreshed client quite some times (3 or 4 already,with some time distance in between) and it doesnt seem to do the trick.Is there some time frame in which i'll know for sure it's not gonna apply at all?
